text: Princess Eugenie of York and her now - husband Jack Brooksbank, the U. K. ambassador for George Clooney and Rande Gerber's tequila brand, Casamigos, were together for about seven years before tying the knot. But they kept much of their relationship out of the public eye. Here's what you need to know about newlyweds Princess Eugenie and Jack Brooksbank's love story. They first met in Verbier, Switzerland. Getty Images Tim Graham The happy couple first met in 2010, at Verbier, a Swiss holiday resort and ski area, when Princess Eugenie was 20 and Brooksbank was 24, according to the BBC.
